includedAssets.title: The Maze Runner
includedAssets.synopsis: Teen Dylan O'Brien finds himself trapped inside a huge maze from which he must mount a daring escape. Action-packed adaptation of the hit novel.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Teen Dylan O'Brien finds himself trapped inside a huge maze from which he must mount a daring escape. Action-packed adaptation of the hit novel.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Teen Dylan O'Brien finds himself trapped inside a huge maze from which he must mount a daring escape. Action-packed adaptation of the hit novel.

includedAssets.title: Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
includedAssets.synopsis: After fleeing The Maze, the renegade "Gladers" - led by Thomas (Dylan O'Brien) - are taken in by charitable host Janson (Aiden Gillen) and given food and shelter in a vast underground complex. However, they become suspicious of his motives and escape into The Scorch, a vast desert dotted with shattered cities that's also home to guerrilla resistance group Right Arm. More dystopian thrills in the second instalment of the Young Adult adventure series.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Frenetic sci-fi action sequel following a group of teenage survivors trying to stay free of a sinister and controlling organisation.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: After fleeing The Maze, the renegade "Gladers" - led by Thomas (Dylan O'Brien) - are taken in by charitable host Janson (Aiden Gillen) and given food and shelter in a vast underground complex. However, they become suspicious of his motives and escape into The Scorch, a vast desert dotted with shattered cities that's also home to guerrilla resistance group Right Arm. More dystopian thrills in the second instalment of the Young Adult adventure series.

includedAssets.title: Maze Runner Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: A group of boys must fight their way out of a deadly maze and uncover more about the mysterious dystopian world they have been thrown into. Dylan O'Brien stars in this pair of hit adaptations from James Dashner's series of young adult novels.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A group of boys must fight their way out of a deadly maze and uncover more about the mysterious world they have been thrown into. Dylan O'Brien stars.
